name: Strength training
description: A one-on-one health and lifestyle transformation for those who require extra accountability and direction in order to achieve their objectives.

name: Nutrition Coaching
description: To ensure you stay on track, get a handle on your nutrition once and for all with intensive nutrition and habit coaching.

name: Mindset Course
description: In as little as 5 weeks, you can change your thinking. Set significant goals, alter your habits, increase your willpower, and increase your motivation.
